tool.name: Resistance Gene Identifier (RGI) - Convert RGI JSON to Tab-delimited
tool.description: This tool converts RGI json output file to tab-demited output
tool.help:
usage: rgi_jsontab [-h] [-i AFILE] [-o OUTPUT] [-v VERBOSE]
Convert RGI JSON file to Tab-delimited file
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -i AFILE, --afile AFILE must be a json file generated from RGI in JSON or gzip format e.g out.json, out.json.gz -o OUTPUT, --out_file OUTPUT Output Tab-delimited file (default=dataSummary) -v VERBOSE, --verbose VERBOSE include help menu. Options are OFF or ON (default = OFF for no help)
